PATIENT_ID: TEST_MSK_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-17 12:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-17 12:10:00
Category III activation for 55-year-old female. Ground-level fall.
Isolated left wrist injury. Minor mechanism.
BP 134/82, HR 70, RR 14, GCS 15.
Hemodynamically stable throughout evaluation.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-17 12:30:00
Left wrist x-ray: distal radius fracture, nondisplaced.
No other injuries identified on survey.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-17 12:50:00
Isolated distal radius fracture. Splinted and discharged.
No surgical urgency. Outpatient follow-up arranged.
